title: Kerry Washington cuts a casual figure as she arrives makeup-free
text:
She stole hearts across the globe as Olivia Pope in ABC's Scandal. And now Kerry Washington is working on another TV show: Little Fires Everywhere.

On Thursday the 42-year-old Emmy nominee was seen arriving to the LA set of the show with no makeup on.

The beauty was chatting on her cell phone as she carried a a bag of healthy juices from Kreation.

Fresh: Kerry Washington readied for another starring small-screen role on Thursday as she was spotted arriving to the set of her new TV series Little Fires Everywhere

She navigated the set in a pair of grey lace-up sneakers as she chatted on the phone with a smile.

Her face was free of makeup to reveal a clear, fresh complexion and her hair was pulled into an effortless bun.

Also in tow was her on-screen daughter Lexi Underwood, 16, who appeared to be pregnant on the show.

On-duty: The 42-year-old Emmy nominee donned a casual look in a navy blue hoodie and a pair of light-wash boyfriend jeans

Kerry got her start performing during her school years at George Washington University, where she earned a degree in performance studies.

The actress would go on to make her film debut in 2000's Our Song, followed by roles in Save the Last Dance and Bad Company.

Her appearances in Ray and The Last King of Scotland earned her several accolades, and by 2012 she scored her iconic role on Scandal.

Co-star: Also in tow was her on-screen daughter Lexi Underwood, 16, who appeared to be pregnant on the show

Kerry married pro football player Nnamdi Asomugha in June 2013 in Idaho.

The two share five-year-old Isabelle and three-year-old Caleb together.

But she loves being busy as the star told Net-A-Porter: 'I wake up, I have a house full of kids and pets, a new production company, I’m number one on the call sheet, and I think: "I will not go down. There’s always another way."'

She had been engaged previously to actor David Moscow from 2004 until 2007.
description: She stole hearts across the globe as Olivia Pope in ABC's Scandal. And Kerry Washington readied for another starring small-screen role on Thursday as she was spotted arriving to the set of
